document_data.name: ''20,000 Leagues Under the Sea''
document_data.author: [[Jules Verne]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''20,000 Leagues Under the Sea''''' was a [[book]] found on the [[Sea of Swords]] and [[Nelanther Islands]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: The book was penned by an unknown author peculiarly named [[Jules Verne]], sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. Several copies of the novel could be found in the pirate-ridden [[Spindrift Town]], notably, one copy belonged to the [[Willigam]] family of the pirate town and was kept in their manor.
